Description: EPIPHONE LES PAUL 100 SOLIDBODY ELECTRIC GUITAR, MAHOGANY, MAPLE TOP, CHERRY SUNBURST MAHOGANY BODY, MAPLE TOP, MAHOGANY NECK, ROSEWOOD FINGERBOARD, AND 2 HUMBUCKING PICKUPS The Epiphone Les Paul 100 solidbody electric guitar gives you the features of the legendary Les Paul for an amazingly low price that fits any budget! This Les Paul 100 features a slightly slimmer body than its cousin, making it comfortable and very playable. Two hot open-coil humbuckers provide plenty of output for sustaining chords and blasting leads, and the individual tone controls let you adjust the sound of the Les Paul 100 to your taste. Get great tone, amazing looks, and incredible playing comfort with the affordable Epiphone Les Paul 100 solidbody electric guitar! This Epiphone Les Paul 100 sports a mahogany body with maple top, a mahogany neck, a rosewood fingerboard, and two humbucking pickups. It's the recipe the Les Paul has been based on since its introduction in the '50s, giving you the same tonal prowess and exceptional sustain that made it a permanent icon. Beginning guitarists will love the slimmer design of the Les Paul 100. It's got a just-right feel when sitting down and isn't too heavy when played standing. And whether you're buying your first electric guitar or helping someone else start their musical journey, why would you want to just get something to play on for six months and then get a "good" one? The Les Paul 100 is affordable enough for beginners, but it also has the tone and feel you'll never want to let go of. This Epiphone Les Paul 100 Solidbody Electric Guitar is a used item in close to excellent condition. This is a very clean used guitar with no visible scratches, dings, scuffs or other concerns. The sunburst on this one looks great and the pickups sound real good. You will receive this item well-packed but without a case, gig bag, or the original packaging. A gig bag is available for an additional cost. Please contact this seller for additional information. Returns are limited so please ask all questions before bidding as your satisfaction is important to me before you purchase. Customer 100% satisfaction is our one and only goal.
